Hi fname
Today we are offering Domaine Laleure Piot  Pernard  Vergelesses  1er Cru Les Vergelesses  Rouge 28  originally priced at 7 and available now for only 2799
Ground shipping is free with your purchase of 2 bottles

Click here to Buy Now
 

93 Points   Jonathan H Newman

 6OFF  

Burgundys Great Premier Cru Pinot Noir From The Famed Fifth  Generation LaleurePiot Family Estate This Is Very Rare Very Limited  And Absolutely Beautiful


93 Points  Jonathan H Newman


Distinguishing aromas of raspberries wild strawberries  ginger spice and plum Beautiful and bountiful flavors of black  raspberry kirsch and dark cherries with a cinnamon nutmeg spice box  and touches of violets
Cheers

The Customer Service Team
Wines Til Sold Out

<p><strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Hi Subscriber,</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Today we are offering Domaine Laleure Piot <br> Pernard  Vergelesses <br> 1er Cru Les Vergelesses <br> Rouge 2008 <br> originally priced at </span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">$70.00</span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;"> and available now for only </span><span style="font-size: 16.5pt;">$27.99</span><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">.</span><br />
<strong><span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">Ground shipping is free with your purchase of 2&nbsp; bottle(s).<br />
<br />
<a href="http://www.tillsoldout.com">Click here to Buy Now</a><br />
 </span><br />
<br />
<span style="font-size: 13.5pt;">93 Points -  Jonathan H. Newman!</span><br />
<br />
<div><span style="font-size: xx-large;"><strong>*** 60%&nbsp;OFF!! *** </strong></span></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><span style="font-size: larger;"><em><strong>Burgundy&rsquo;s Great Premier Cru Pinot Noir From The Famed Fifth  Generation Laleure-Piot&nbsp; Family Estate. This Is Very Rare, Very Limited  And Absolutely Beautiful!</strong></em></span></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><span style="font-size: medium;"><strong>93 Points - Jonathan H. Newman!</strong></span><span style="font-size: smaller;">*</span></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><span style="font-size: larger;">...Distinguishing aromas of raspberries, wild strawberries,  ginger spice and plum. Beautiful and bountiful flavors of black  raspberry,&nbsp; kirsch and dark cherries with a cinnamon nutmeg spice box  and touches of violets.</span><span style="font-size: smaller;">*</span></div><br />
Cheers,<br />
<br />
The Customer Service Team<br />
Wines 'Til Sold Out<br />
